description: Telecommunications service applications including mobile plans, internet service, and equipment requests

submissions.content: Application for family mobile phone plan. Account holder: James Brown, SSN: 123-00-4567, phone: (555) 012-3456, email: j.brown@email.com. Service address: 654 Pine Street, Seattle, WA 98101. Plan: Unlimited family plan for 4 lines. Credit check authorized. Previous carrier: Verizon, account in good standing for 8 years.
submissions.summary: Family mobile plan - 4 lines - Unlimited - Credit check

submissions.content: Application for residential high-speed internet service. Customer: Susan Davis, SSN: 234-00-5678, phone: (555) 123-4567, email: s.davis@email.com. Service address: 987 Maple Avenue, Phoenix, AZ 85001. Plan requested: Gigabit internet with Wi-Fi router included. Installation required. Credit score: 720. No previous service issues.

submissions.content: Enterprise phone system request for small business. Business: Marketing Pro Agency, contact: Michelle Taylor, SSN: 345-00-6789, phone: (555) 234-5678, email: m.taylor@marketingpro.com. Business address: 147 Business Park Drive, Miami, FL 33101. submissions.summary: Business phone system - 20 lines - Conference calling - $2K budget

submissions.content: Mobile device upgrade request. Customer: Kevin Martinez, existing customer for 3 years, account #TEL789456. SSN: 456-00-7890, phone: (555) 345-6789, email: k.martinez@email.com.
